attributes.action: Save the George brian centre, and keep some mental heal services in Tamworth
attributes.additional_details: Mental health is on the rise, costa on the rise, and services being moved further away for service users. This could cost more for transportation of patients
attributes.background: Not to close the centre, keep out patient and day case at the locals community

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about the closure of hospitals are a matter for individual clinical commissioning groups (CCGs), not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise this issue with your local MP. You can use this page to find out who your local MP is, and how to contact them: https://members.parliament.uk/FindYourMP
